name: Samael
description:
'''Samael''' ({{IPAc-en|ˈ|s|æ|m|ə|ˌ|ɛ|l}}) is a Swiss [[heavy metal music|metal]] band formed in [[Sion, Switzerland|Sion]] in 1987. Their current lineup includes founding members and brothers [[Michael Locher|Vorphalack (Vorph)]] and Xytraguptor (Xy), guitarist Drop and bassist Ales. A few other members have been part of the band throughout the years: Rodolph H. (keyboards, 1993–1995), Kaos (guitar, 1996–2001), Mas (bass, 1991–2014) and Makro (guitar, 2002–2018).

Samael is known to incorporate [[Heavy metal music|metal]], [[Industrial music|industrial]], [[Electronic music|electronic]] and [[symphonic music]] into their sound and mix it with massive beats, martial rhythms and up-tempo or [[blast beat]]. One of the key elements that distinguishes Samael from traditional metal bands is the use of a [[drum machine]] in studio and live on stage.
